name: Revive Again
description:
• How play?
    • Use wasd to move.
    • Use the mouse to aim.
    • Use button left of the mouse to shot.
    • Use button right of the mouse to active skill.
  • How works?
    • Whenever the player dies, he revive.
    • When the player dies by a special enemy, he acquires the enemy's skill.
    • There are two skills to acquire, the dash and create a small wall.
  • Objective
    • Arrive the platform in the end of the map.
